attributes.action: Cap the annual price increase of essential utilities at the level of inflation or less.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This year has seen gas and electricity bills rise by almost 40% in the UK.

EDF for example increased domestic fuel tariffs by 36% in the UK but were capped at 2% in France.

This is blatant profiteering by the energy companies. If they can't make profits at inflation level increases then they should leave the market to those companies who can.

I propose annual domestic utility increases are capped at the level of the inflation rate or less.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
